flawed_nl_solution:
The number of truck stamps is 11 + 9 = <<11+9=19>>19.
The number of rose stamps is 19 − 13 = <<19-13=6>>6.
Bella bought 11 + 19 + 6 = <<11+19+6=36>>36 stamps in all.
#### 36

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
